title: Did you know?
body:
That Orianna's auto attacks proc {{item:3116}} slow?

I just found out in my last game as {{champion:78}}. I had the wiles to escape, outplay, and kill the bruiser Yasuo with {{item:3022}}, but god forbid I even move with the permaslow on this champion.

The best part? There's nothing I can build to counter it that will actually help that much.

EDIT: Have playtested this a couple times, having mixed results. At points Ori's auto attack slows without applying the "chilled" debuff of Rylai's, other times it works as intended. Possible bug...?

replies.body:
Really? That is absolutely disgusting!

I'm so proud of my precious princess!
Now photoshop a Sion in it screaming "COOOOOWAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAARDS!"
Yes, because her aas do extra magic damage that I guess applies on hit.
And if that wasn't enough, she also has W to slow as well.

Please just wait for Rylai's to be nerfed.

I don't want my Ori nerfed because of some stupid interaction that is going to be nerfed soon anyways.  I honestly didn't even know her auto's applied Rylai's because by the time I have Rylai's, my Q's on short enough of a cd to be the slow.

> [{quoted}](name=Votable Jester,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XnnL0HkM,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-26T21:49:58.101+0000)
>
> Please just wait for Rylai's to be nerfed.
> 
> I don't want my Ori nerfed because of some stupid interaction that is going to be nerfed soon anyways.  I honestly didn't even know her auto's applied Rylai's because by the time I have Rylai's, my Q's on short enough of a cd to be the slow.

It doesn't proc rylais. he's just spreading false information to get rylais nerfed lmao

I'm fine with Rylai's being nerfed.  I honestly hate the item as well.  I never built it before, but have to now with its absurd power.

I just hope they give some new high AP item to take its place because we're really low on them.

It doesn't proc rylais.
It doesn't proc spell effects. 
Even the wiki says it doesn't.
Stop spreading false information

Then the wiki is wrong. I have a replay of getting slowed by Orianna's auto attacks, it's definitely there.

Even the Orianna herself said that they built it because the passive procs it, and when I remarked that her autos aren't a spell she responded that it was her "passive spell."

Stop slandering other people.

> [{quoted}](name=Melledoneus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XnnL0HkM,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2016-10-27T02:03:23.884+0000)
>
> Then the wiki is wrong. I have a replay of getting slowed by Orianna's auto attacks, it's definitely there.
> 
> Even the Orianna herself said that they built it because the passive procs it, and when I remarked that her autos aren't a spell she responded that it was her "passive spell."
> 
> Stop slandering other people.

then post replay. i'll go test it in a custom right now.
Just tested. It doesn't proc rylais.
:^). Good job getting people to believe you though

You know rylais is one of ori's core items right? They build it because her Q is on a low cooldown.
Jax' W or ult proc empowered autos also proc Rylais.
So if you combined nashor's tooth and Rylai's, perma slow AA?

No it doesn't?
I just built it in a custom game and it didn't do anything :s

Tried on bots, minions, and jungle monsters and none of them worked
